name: Beam (itch) (Beam the game)
description:
Beam is the story of a beam of light entering the Earth's atmosphere.

Discover your colors, explore the ocean, or grow a tree. The world is yours.

How To Play

Click the plain dots/text to make them glow. Take your time.

What's special about Beam?

Beam was created to be a meditative, healing, and brief adventure (light travels fast after all). Through the use of evocative writing, soft pulsating colors, and soothing music, the mind is encouraged to breathe and wander through the story at a personal pace.

Beam Credits:

Created, written, scored, and coded by Courtney Jines. (My first game! Let me know what you think xo)

Official Selection Slamdance DIG 2019

Tech Requirements:

Beam is not currently playable on mobile apps or devices. Beam works best played fullscreen on browsers such as Google Chrome or Firefox. Plug in headphones and wait for the music to begin before starting for the best play experience.
